snippet: Paul Konigsberg, a former associate of Bernard Madoff, avoided prison for his role in perpetuating a multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Laura Taylor Swain in New York lets former Bernard Madoff associate Paul Konigsberg off without prison time for his role in Ponzi scheme.
lead_paragraph: Paul Konigsberg, a former associate of Bernard Madoff, avoided prison for his role in perpetuating a multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme.

headline.main: Judge Lets Off Madoff Associate Without Prison Time
